snippet: Tampa Bay added one of Coach Greg Schiano’s former college players, defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who injured his spinal cord in a Rutgers game in 2010.
abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers make a notable and poignant free-agent signing when they add one of coach Greg Schiano’s former Rutgers players, defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who was paralyzed after injuring his spinal cord in a game in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay added one of Coach Greg Schiano’s former college players, defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who injured his spinal cord in a Rutgers game in 2010.

headline.seo: Buccaneers Sign Eric LeGrand in a Poignant Gesture
headline.main: Paralyzed Player Signed by His Former Coach

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
